Package Mediator

Class CheckInOut

java.lang.Object
Mediator.CheckInOut
public class CheckInOut
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a CheckInOut mediator
Since:
2022-04-17
Version:
1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private static CheckInOut instance
    The Instance of this Mediator

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private CheckInOut()
    Constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private Room assignRoom​(Reservation reservation)
    Return first vacant room of reservation roomType No updates to room and reservation details in this function
    void changeRoom​(java.lang.String reservationID, java.lang.String roomID)
    Run change room process - Check for validity of change room request - Transfer all existing orders to new room - Update reservation with roomID and new room type - Clear old room guestID and set status to occupied - Set new room guestID and set status to occupied
    void checkIn​(java.lang.String reservationID)
    Run checkin process communicating across RoomController and ReservationController Room > Update status to occupied and register guestID Reservation > Update status to checkin, set checkin date to current time, and update roomID to assigned room Reservation is assigned to first available room during checkin
    void checkOut​(java.lang.String roomID, float roomDiscount, float orderDiscount)
    Run checkout process communicating across RoomController and ReservationController Room > Update status to vacant and clear registered guestID Reservation > Update status to completed and set checkout date to current time Send reservation object and discount rates to printReceipt behaviour for receipt printing
    private long countWeekends​(java.util.Date start, java.util.Date end)
    Count number of weekends between given dates - For purpose of hotel weekends are Friday and Saturday
    static CheckInOut getInstance()
    Returns the CheckInOut instance and creates an instance if it does not exist
    int numAvailability​(java.util.Date dateCheck, RoomTypes roomType)
    Check for number of available rooms of specified roomType at a specified date Number of available rooms = Total number of rooms - Number of confirmed guest with booking where dateCheck falls between checkin and checkout date - Number of checked in guest with bookings where dateCheck falls before checkout date
    void payment​(java.lang.String reservationID)
    Change all order status of a given reservation to paid
    void printReceipt​(Reservation reservation, float roomDiscount, float orderDiscount)
    Calculate and print receipt of a reservation - Weekends bookings (Fri-Sat & Sat-Sun) cost 10% more - GST rate = 7% - Service Charge rate = 10% - Room and order discounts are applied separately to allow for further expansion
    private java.util.Date removeTime​(java.util.Date date)
    Sets time of input date to 00:00:00
    void setReservationCreditcard​(java.lang.String reservationID, java.lang.String cardNumber, java.util.Date expiryDate, int CVV, int type, java.lang.String cardName)
    Set creditcard details used for payment of a reservation
    private boolean validCheckIn​(Reservation reservation)
    Check if reservation is invalid for checkin - reservation object is null - reservation checkin date is not current date - reservation status is not confirm status
    private boolean validCheckOut​(Reservation reservation)
    Check if reservation is invalid for checkout - reservation object is null - reservation status is not checkin status
    private boolean validRoomChange​(Reservation reservation, Room room)
    Check if change room request is invalid - Reservation object is null - Room object is null - Change date is not checkin date (can only change on checkin date) - New room is not vacant

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Constructor

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static CheckInOut getInstance()
      Returns the CheckInOut instance and creates an instance if it does not exist
      Returns:
      CheckInOut instance

    • checkOut

      public void checkOut​(java.lang.String roomID, float roomDiscount, float orderDiscount)
      Run checkout process communicating across RoomController and ReservationController Room > Update status to vacant and clear registered guestID Reservation > Update status to completed and set checkout date to current time Send reservation object and discount rates to printReceipt behaviour for receipt printing
      Parameters:
      roomID - ID of room to be checked-out
      roomDiscount - User input for discounts on room
      orderDiscount - User input for discounts on orders

    • checkIn

      public void checkIn​(java.lang.String reservationID)
      Run checkin process communicating across RoomController and ReservationController Room > Update status to occupied and register guestID Reservation > Update status to checkin, set checkin date to current time, and update roomID to assigned room Reservation is assigned to first available room during checkin
      Parameters:
      reservationID - ID of reservation to be checked-in

    • changeRoom

      public void changeRoom​(java.lang.String reservationID, java.lang.String roomID)
      Run change room process - Check for validity of change room request - Transfer all existing orders to new room - Update reservation with roomID and new room type - Clear old room guestID and set status to occupied - Set new room guestID and set status to occupied
      Parameters:
      reservationID - ID of reservation to change room
      roomID - ID of room to be changed to

    • numAvailability

      public int numAvailability​(java.util.Date dateCheck, RoomTypes roomType)
      Check for number of available rooms of specified roomType at a specified date Number of available rooms = Total number of rooms - Number of confirmed guest with booking where dateCheck falls between checkin and checkout date - Number of checked in guest with bookings where dateCheck falls before checkout date
      Parameters:
      dateCheck - Date to check for availability
      roomType - Room Type to check for availability
      Returns:
      int Number of available rooms at given date

    • printReceipt

      public void printReceipt​(Reservation reservation, float roomDiscount, float orderDiscount)
      Calculate and print receipt of a reservation - Weekends bookings (Fri-Sat & Sat-Sun) cost 10% more - GST rate = 7% - Service Charge rate = 10% - Room and order discounts are applied separately to allow for further expansion
      Parameters:
      reservation - Reservation Object to calculate price
      roomDiscount - Discounts on room cost
      orderDiscount - Discounts on orders cost

    • payment

      public void payment​(java.lang.String reservationID)
      Change all order status of a given reservation to paid
      Parameters:
      reservationID - which Orders will be changed to paid

    • setReservationCreditcard

      public void setReservationCreditcard​(java.lang.String reservationID, java.lang.String cardNumber, java.util.Date expiryDate, int CVV, int type, java.lang.String cardName)
      Set creditcard details used for payment of a reservation
      Parameters:
      reservationID -
      cardNumber -
      expiryDate -
      CVC -
      type -
      cardName -

    • removeTime

      private java.util.Date removeTime​(java.util.Date date)
      Sets time of input date to 00:00:00
      Parameters:
      date - Date to set time
      Returns:
      Date after setting time to 00:00:00

    • countWeekends

      private long countWeekends​(java.util.Date start, java.util.Date end)
      Count number of weekends between given dates - For purpose of hotel weekends are Friday and Saturday
      Parameters:
      start - Starting date to check from
      end - Ending date to check to
      Returns:
      long Number of weekends between given dates

    • validCheckIn

      private boolean validCheckIn​(Reservation reservation)
      Check if reservation is invalid for checkin - reservation object is null - reservation checkin date is not current date - reservation status is not confirm status
      Parameters:
      reservation - Reservation object to check validity
      Returns:
      boolean true - valid, false - invalid

    • validCheckOut

      private boolean validCheckOut​(Reservation reservation)
      Check if reservation is invalid for checkout - reservation object is null - reservation status is not checkin status
      Parameters:
      reservation - Reservation object to check validity
      Returns:
      boolean true - valid, false - invalid

    • validRoomChange

      private boolean validRoomChange​(Reservation reservation, Room room)
      Check if change room request is invalid - Reservation object is null - Room object is null - Change date is not checkin date (can only change on checkin date) - New room is not vacant
      Parameters:
      reservation - Reservation object to check validity
      Returns:
      boolean true - valid, false - invalid

    • assignRoom

      private Room assignRoom​(Reservation reservation)
      Return first vacant room of reservation roomType No updates to room and reservation details in this function
      Parameters:
      reservation - to assign room to
      Returns:
      Room room assigned to reservation
